oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Envelope with Confederate stamp captured by Union soldier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written on by G. W. Ferree of Co. E, 59th Ohio Volunteer Infantry (OVI)""I will here send you a Reb postage stamp and envelope that was captured in the Battle field of Missionary Ridge on Wednesday Nov. 25th 1863. Mother keep this as a memento of the Battle of the above name and date." The Confederate States of America stamp has a likeness of Jefferson Davis on it.
